titulo: This mattress is far better than you think it is
descripcion:
I am a gentleman of size. A size large enough that it is statistically unlikely that anyone reading this review will be larger. I purchased this mattress because my old spring-based unit had finally reached its end of life and I was casting about for a replacement. When you're a size-enhanced individual, however, maths gets involved. Your options decrease.

I rolled the dice on this model of mattress because, at the time of purchase, it was a little over $300 Canadian. At time of purchase, this is about the price of a bargain spring mattress. I had serious doubt that this would support me, but was worth the risk.

The result was beyond my wildest expectations. The mattress provides amazing support, both for myself and my wife. I haven't slept this well in 20 years.

Now, I have no way of knowing how long this mattress will last in this condition. Continued use will no doubt reduce the firmness and support of the foam. Just as spring mattresses eventually reach end of life, so too must this foam mattress. That said, I don't honestly think lifespan should be a serious consideration. The quality of the item is such that I am confident of getting at least a few years out of it, even at my size.

More to the point, perhaps, the quality of the sleep is such that, at $300 Canadian for the mattress, I would glad buy a new one every year just to be able to sleep that well each night. The ability to wake up refreshed like this every morning will pay for itself a thousand fold. I've gotten more done in the first morning after my first night's sleep on this thing than I accomplished in most of the week prior. Coming from a broken down spring mattress that had me tossing and turning all night, the difference in quality of sleep really is that stark.

titulo: 8" Queen size gel infused Zinus-AMAZING value.
descripcion:
Arrived 3 days early,reached 6" within 2 hours,fully expanded to 8" the next day.
I've read reviews that claim that you need 10-12" memory foam matresses to be comfortable,this is nonsense,you only sink about an inch into the top layer so a 12" matress is just more redundant foam,and more expensive!
My last memory foam matress I bought in the UK for 80GBP delivered as it was the previous years model(which makes no difference to me lol),I had to leave that amazing matress when I moved to Canada and had to suffer a spring matress again.
My previous foam matress was 10",this Zinus is only 8' and there is ZERO difference in the comfort of them,the gel infused foam is great for not getting too warm,and the sleeps I have had on this matress so far are great.
You don't need to go out and spend $800-$1,000 for a good matress when companies like this can provide the same comfort at around 1/4 of the price,yes it does have a funky damp smell but that will soon go away,its not bad enough to disturb my sleep.
My wife and I both LOVE this matress,we needed it,no more sore/stiff backs in the morning,and the price was excellent,best nights sleep I've had in over 5 years!!

titulo: Would highly recommend if you're looking for a firm yet soft and comfortable bed.

It's soft like memory foam yet firm enough to be supportive which was my main concern that it would be poorly made and too soft. But it isn't! It's helped my back immensely and has helped our sleeping which had helped our mental state.

titulo: Great value comfortable memory foam mattress
descripcion:
Our now 4 year old youngest son is just graduating to his own grown up bed that I've built him so we needed a mattress. Obviously at that age we didn't want or need to spend fortunes on one, so after a bit of searching around we decided on this zinus one as it seemed well reviewed and also a very reasonable price.

Mattress arrived promptly as always with amazon, and we opened it the same day after I finished up building his bed. The photo shows mattress just installed approx 15 mins after unwrapping, it has evened out properly after about 48 hours.

In line with what others have said, there is a fairly strong, unpleasant odour initially. We set the mattress up on the bed and left it for 48 hours to expand fully, and the smell did reduce quite a bit. With bedlinen on there's no noticeable smell.

Comfort wise I'm honestly surprised how good this mattress is. It's the 8 inch deep one, which is more like 6-7 inches in reality. Seems quite firm, but then you lay on it and it's just... Comfortable feeling. As a 190lb adult, I'd probably go for a deeper one but this one is surprisingly supportive, without being either too firm or too soft.

Given the price, this was a pleasant surprise üëç also surprised how much movement dampening there is-our little guy was jumping excitedly on his new bed while I laid next to him, and honestly I felt no disturbance at all.

Overall I'd say really pretty unbeatable value, perfect for kids or guest bed, comfortable enough at a great price. For your everyday adult bed, maybe go for the deeper 10 or 12 inch version for extra comfort.

titulo: and it is amazing to see this bed raises to the full height ...
descripcion:
I got a 12 inch height bed, and it is amazing to see this bed raises to the full height after 24 hours.

The first night I used, it feels very soft and nice. After a few days, every day when I and my wife wakes up, we have shoulder pains. My wife have it on both shoulder, while I only have it on one. We are side sleepers. You may not want to get this if you are a side sleeper.

Awful product.  First off, this mattress is not even close to 8".  I've had it unpacked for over a week and it's between 5"-7" depending on which part of the mattress you measure (yes, it's NOT the same height throughout).  Second, the smell from the foam is strong.  I'm not that sensitive to smell but had to sleep on the sofa for a few days because the odor of the mattress was literally keeping me up.  I'd stay away from this (or other Zinus products for that matter...) unless you really don't care and just want something cheap.  I'd like to give a shout out to Amazon for excellent customer service.  I had concerns buying something so large online but I wouldn't hesitate buying large items from Amazon (they make sure you are 100% satisfied).  Hope this review helps, I wasted a lot of time with this purchase and hope I can prevent others from making the same mistake.

titulo: Massage the corners, sides, and ends to decompress more evenly
descripcion: Not having slept on a memory foam mattress before, I thought I would gamble and purchase it anyway since the price was so low.  I am very content with this purchase. As pointed out by other reviewers, the mattress isn‚Äôt quite 8‚Äù. Most of the mid-section does come close and the two short ends are at about 7‚Äù. That actually worked out well for me because I‚Äôm using this on my daybed. It‚Äôs a snug fit lengthwise and the pressure helps to lift the ends to the same height as the mid-section. It‚Äôs also very comfortable to lie on. I took a fellow reviewer‚Äôs helpful advice of massaging the corners to get them to decompress more evenly. In fact, I massaged the sides and ends regularly over the 72 hours to assist with this process and I think that‚Äôs why my mattress decompressed quite evenly and structured. Great value for the price.

I have two gel-infused memory foam pillows that I'm really happy with, so I thought I'd try this mattress. It was sold at a good price, came very quickly, and is VERY comfortable. You sink into the top layer, but are supported nicely by the layers below. I'd read complaints that others' didn't plump up properly; but mine was almost the full thickness almost immediately after I unrolled it, and within a couple of hours, it seemed to be full size. Still, I waited a day, just to be sure, before I used it. I'm VERY happy with it.

There is a slight scent to it, which I don't find at all unpleasant, and which seems to be fading. The only drawback I've noticed is that it does seem to slip a bit on the base I have, so I might buy one of those no-slip sheets to put under it -- but it's not really a problem just to move it back into place.

I found that if I tipped it up and flexed it around to agitate it; it accelerated the process and became a little more even. After a day, it was pretty much at advertised thickness. Even if it never reached the full 12", I was planning to keep it anyway because it was still comfortable and was a respectable price.
Other buyers have complained of an odour, but I did not make note of anything after opening it.

Overall, good price, prompt shipping. Convenient to get it delivered right to your door. Bonus that it is actually comfortable too! I'm happy with this purchase.

I've had this bed for a week now. It's been in a room with open windows and two fans going, but the intense, toxic smell has not dissipated or lessened at all. I've been sleeping on an air mattress while it airs out, but the smell is giving me really bad headaches and trouble breathing- despite the packaging saying the smell is normal and not toxic. The bed has been really comfortable when I have tried it out, but if the smell continues it will be unusable and not worth my basic health. I wish I could return the bed, but there is no conceivable way for me to mail a giant bed back. I would have gone with a spring mattress or a different memory foam mattress if I would have known the smell would be so strong. I cannot recommend this mattress if you aren't able to leave it in a room of its own with all the windows open for... well, still waiting.... Not sure if others lucked out and I received one that had been sitting in packaging for a long time or what. But the smell is really really strong and not going away so far.

titulo: Does not expand to full height
descripcion:
I am a woman of average size, 5, 8 123 lbs. I purchased this mattress because my old (and I mean 20 Year old mattress) had finally reached its end of life and I was waking up with unbearable back pain and not sleeping.

I needed something softer and could not handle another spring mattress; I thought about Casper or Endy but had never owned a foam mattress before so thought I would roll the dice on this one as it was a good price.

Upon unpacking it, it has a terrible smell to it (they do warn you of this in the cards they send) ‚Ä¶ the cards are a nice touch to their product but the product itself is not worth it. The smell did not go away for me after a few days and gives me headaches.

After 48 hours it had barely hit 5 inches, I paid for 8 so I expect 8, the ends only inflated to 3.5 at best so it was awkward, this isn‚Äôt a true queen either as it hangs off the bed (maybe a Queen plus?)

I am perimenopause (yes at 39) and if you are in the stage where you are getting hot flashes, this bed is NOT for you!!! Had to revert to the couch, as it is so HOT, I was drenched in sweat (something my old crappy mattress never did to me). When you first lay on it feels soooo comfortable; however, throughout the night it gets worse and worse, it is so firm I woke up with my usual back pain PLUS my neck and ribs were hurting, I am a side sleeper, perhaps it would be okay for someone on their back?

There is no way for me to return this, it was a bugger getting it up the stairs as is for how heavy it was (they do say have two people carry it so I imagine that was part of the issue). I would not recommend buying this, perhaps the higher end ones expand to how they should but this one definitely did not come close, we pay for the inches, if I wanted below 6 I would had bought a 6.

I love the idea of this mattress, I like the personal touch they put into their cards but I cannot handle sleeping on something so firm. I am disappointed that it did not even hit a 6 when I bought an 8 and they really need to do something about the smell (maybe I am over sensitive to smells but I cannot get past it). I don‚Äôt think I would purchase from them again.

This bed arrived in three days - and took about 48 hours to fully inflate to true size. It came in a good size box, and easy to read instructions. Overall the presentation I am very impressed with. The cards that come inside are very friendly, and funny, allowing for a pleasant experience while unpacking your new purchase.

I recommend massaging the corners of the bed during the two day wait, as they were not growing at the same rate as the rest of the bed (middle thicker than edges). I also did not sleep or lay on the bed or put sheets on until 48 hours had passed.

The bed did not have a smell at first, but once it was fully grown I could get the hint of green tea when I was laying in it. Since I love the smell, it was not a bother to me, but to others it could be stronger than liked for about a day (I opened a window in the room to ventilate during this entire process).

If I could give a 4.5/5 then I would, as my only concern with the mattress is that it is a little (& I mean a minuscule) bit firmer than I would have liked, but still very comfortable.

This mattress is amazing to sleep on, very soundless, partner cannot feel or hear me get up anymore nor is the dogs rolling a bother now.

I bought the 8 inch size & would buy again! The photo is from when I first opened it.

titulo: This is just foam after all......
descripcion:
First off the bed came well packaged and it did rise to almost 12" as advertised, we are using it as a guest bed, there was no noticible odour.

I couldn't help but draw comparison's to my brand name foam bed that we sleep on nightly, even though it was more than twice the price because of the proliferation of these beds I reasoned that the prices were dropping and really...there probably isn't much difference, this is just foam after all.

The first thing I noticed about this bed is the weight, it was surprisingly light compared to the brand name, it made making the bed a pleasure, changing the sheets on the brand name is definitely a chore as it is so heavy. I decided to try it out for a night, I had a pretty good sleep but did notice that it was firmer than expected, when I woke I also noticed that I had a bit of back pain and my shoulder pain had returned, to be fair I should give it more than a night as it may need a break in period.

Is it fair to compare these beds, probably not because of the price difference, I honestly thought that all foam was created equally.

If this is your main bed, and if you have the budget I would encourage everyone if possible to head to a store and try a brand name bed first, or order one with a good return policy, there is a significant difference in quality.

I bought a Zinus metal frame bed and this mattress after suffering with a shitty IKEA wood frame bed with wooden slats that constantly kept falling through. So this time recognizing that the slat system is just bad engineering and that nothing can change that, I opted for a metal frame bed. I have to say, wow, I can't believe I suffered with the other stupidity for so long. I bought this mattress even though it isn't pocket coil but just a memory foam because it had so many reviews vs the other options, and because I could get it the next day. Now, and this isn't Zinus' fault, the mattress didn't arrive the next day, but rather the day after, but with COVID, it's fine. It arrives in a box and you have to let it inflate. I only let it inflate for a few hours. I should mention I bought 8 (EIGHT) inch only and it is MORE THAN ENOUGH. I didn't actually realize how huge the 8 inch would be, I'm glad I didn't buy the 10 or 12 since with a regular bed frame, even the 8 inch one is really high. The mattress is absolutely fantastic. Considering the price and the convenience, I'm not surprised the coil mattresses are almost gone. This mattress is, I would say, medium, and I would have maybe liked it a bit firmer, but you only notice that when you are sitting on it or stand on it. When you lie on it and evenly spread your weight, it's about medium-firm, but gives in a bit, so you feel beautifully hugged without feeling like you're sunk in any way. I would say for vast majority of people this will be just right. When you move on it, it doesn't move the rest of the mattress, like the old coil mattresses do. You can have a plate of food next to you and get up and it won't spill. I was debating whether to get this one or the few top choices that come up when you search, and although I haven't tried those, even though they were cheaper on promo than this one, I opted for this one bec of so many positive reviews and I'm glad I did.

I'm 6'4, 220lbs, so if I liked it, surely you will too..

The only negative I would give it is aesthetic - it is white with a pattern on it, it would be nice if there were some colour options, although you don't exactly see it with your bedsheets on it so no biggie.

titulo: I would have liked to have had a mattress so its back to ...
descripcion: Had to return mattress as it did not fully expand to its dimensions, even after a week. I contacted both Amazon and Zinus who were both very helpful in getting our return executed as simple as possible. I would have liked to have had a mattress so its back to square one.

titulo: A great bed for an amazing price
descripcion:
I bought this bed despite Zinus on Facebook advising me that it's actually medium-soft (Amazon says this bed is medium-firm and that is accurate). I also bought it despite the bad reviews because overall the bed is 4-star and has over 500 reviews. I ordered the 12" King and it arrived promptly with Prime shipping within the week. I unpacked it the same evening it arrived and within an hour it was already 9" tall, after two hours it was 10", and by the following morning it was 11.5"... And that afternoon had fully expanded everywhere to 12".

So after 24 hours in a fairly warm room with a fan going and the window open (I recommend letting it expand in a warm room with great air circulation as heat causes the mattress to expand much quicker), I decided to sleep on it. I didn't sleep too well, but that's because it was still off-gassing a bit and I had a muscle strain in my good shoulder from my previous bed that was still healing, and my bad shoulder was as usual, acting up.

After the second night sleeping on it though, my shoulder pain has diminished greatly in both shoulders and my CHRONIC back pain (from having an injured back) has almost completely dissipated, and as a fibromyalgia sufferer I can say with certainty this bed is helping that as well (I am able to get up in the mornings). I am a bigger woman and fairly tall and this bed provides ample support and comfort despite my size (and there's also plenty of room for my fit hubby when he's not away working). It's also much cooler and dissipates heat much better than my $3000 Stearns and Foster mattress I had prior to this one. It's honestly unbelievable that a mattress that cost me around $500 with taxes and came in a box is better than a $3000 brand name mattress.

A few expected (as stated in the paper that comes with the bed) cons: The off-gassing is quite intense for the first 2-3 days, after that the smell slowly goes away, but you MUST have good air circulation and preferably a fan going and window open. I had a fan going, the window wide open, AND ran my air purifier in the room for 3 days (and still run it at night). As I have a lovebird, I took precautions and actually sent my lovebird to stay with a family member for at least 10 days to be 100% the off gassing smell is gone and the mattress is no longer expelling ANY sort of scent (just because I can't smell it anymore, doesn't mean it won't affect a respiratory-sensitive bird). My dog and cat however aren't bothered at all by the smell, but again... Keep the room ventilated for at least the first 7-10 days or longer just for the well-being of your pets and yourself. And if you are sensitive to smells/chemicals, maybe this bed isn't for you... Unless you have a week or more to allow this bed to fully air out before sleeping on it.

Lastly, if you do NOT have a warm, well-ventilated room and do NOT follow the directions, you're gonna end up like the folks leaving one-star reviews on this bed - The bed expands best this way and the smell goes away faster with proper air circulation.

titulo: Didnt expand fully but replacement on its way!
descripcion:
3* first mattress and 5* customer service -

Mattress was delivered promptly, opened it, laid it out, was a little crushed so made sure to loosen the fabric etc to allow to expand...

5 days later and it was still at 5 inches... Supposed to be 8. My friends mattress was a 6inch, had fully expanded after 1hr and was bigger than mine! My corners were sitting at 3inches. I waited the full 7 days and slept on it - still comfy but not what i paid for.

Contacted Zinus customer service direct and after a few emails and exchanging picture proof they told me as it was still in the 30 day return policy it would be better to go through Amazon.

On amazon, put in a replacement request via UPS. It was saying that the mattress would need to be returned (via pickup when the next one arrives) i called customer service just to make sure about the return policy. They told me i wouldnt need to return the item in this case so to donate, discard etc. And the next one is arriving in 5 days. So, all round so far a good experience for if the mattress doesnt expand - dont fret - there are solutions! We'll see how the next one goes and if not, at least i have 2 5-inch mattresses to put together to make a weird 10 inch haha.

titulo: Didnt expand. Waiting to hear back from the company.
descripcion: I was really excited about my mattress after two friends were happy with theirs. I bought the 12 inch but it only expanded to 8 inches even after following the directions and not putting linens or laying on top of it for over 60 hours. I also took it out of the box within half an hour of it arriving.  Not sure if I got a lemon or not but contacted the company yesterday and left a message and still not have heard back. Pretty unhappy.

I really wanted to like this mattress, as it has replaced my aging Tempur Pedic memory foam mattress (which was also a garbage mattress), but this one was simply too firm for me. I'm a 250-lb side sleeper and my shoulders didn't sink nearly enough into the mattress to keep my spine straight (from hip to shoulders my spine was like a ramp).

Pros:
- If you like a firm mattress, then this one would be a great option. The price is decent for the amount of foam.
- Mattress didn't smell bad at all. I was expecting some bad smell, but it was fine. Very minimal odor.

Cons:
- Much too firm for me.
- Had to use another 5 inches of softer memory foam as a topper.
- If I had of known it was going to be so firm and needed a topper, I would have saved some money and bought a thinner version.
- Too expensive to return to seller, probably what their banking on (fewer returns).

titulo: Most comfortable sleep I've ever had
descripcion: I used to have an old spring mattress (10 years +) and decided to upgrade my bed recently. I never realized how much back pain was caused by my old mattress until I switched to this one. I wake up now and I do not have any back or neck pain whatsoever, same goes for my boyfriend. That is a first for us! Of all the hotels, b&bs, airbnbs we've stayed in, I've never slept in a bed this comfortable in my life. One thing I would recommend is to let it decompress much longer than it states on the instructions - I let mine decompress for 4 days total before using it. I definitely recommend this bed!!

To start off I paid at total $190 because of tax. Bought October 2018, it's now August 2019, so it's 2 months to a full year.
It never fully expanded to 7-inches, despite not touching it or sleeping on it for a full week. Well past the 48-72 hours they suggest. At the edges its only around 3-1/2" and the middle is 5". Not 7".
It did have a slight chemically smell for around 7 days, it no longer smells anymore.
As for comfort, it was okay to sleep on for the first 2 weeks tops, but since, its way too firm whilst slightly too squished. Everything is sore. My legs are the most sore, by back is sore, my butt is sore, my feet are sore(Keep in mind I'm only 20). And I'm not happy with my purchase.
Honestly I'd rather sleep on the floor.
Maybe good as a guest bed, where they wont be sleeping on it for more than a week or two; but not good as a full time bed. I think I'm going to switch to a japanese futon, because I've heard good things.

titulo: Bigger than frame, does not fit bed! Corners didn't properly expand! Don't waste your money!
descripcion:
Got the 12 inch Queen version of this on sale for 300$. Figured I'd give it a go!

The mattress took a good week to fully expand (protip: weather plays a role! If it's cold it will take much more time!) and is not perfect. ALL corners lifted at the base and are about 9" when the rest of the mattress reached 10.5-12". I made sure the corners had some loose cover to expand for multiple days!

In my case, once expanded, the mattress is larger than a queen! It does not properly fit the frame of an Ikea Trysil Queen. The corners of the mattress are not touching the bed. Since it is bigger than the frame, only 2 of the 4 sides fit in, making the mattress easily come out of the frame and slide out!

Didn't sleep on it yet as I just finished installing everything, but just from this you can tell there is no QC behind the product!

Bottom line, do not waste your money on this product! It would seem to be very hit or miss!

I'm not sure I can return or exchange it since it is now fully expanded.

titulo: Comfortable but problems with the smell
descripcion: My mattress must have been stored rolled in the plastic for a while. It took a week to expand properly at the outer edges, and never reached 12" (short by 0.5-1" all around). It has continued off-gassing since that time and is still causing difficulty breathing and allergies. The mattress is certainly comfortable, though I can only use it so long before experiencing a reaction to the strong scent. I am waiting to hear back from Zinus representatives.

I set-up the king size 14" high base & a 12" mattress from Zinus all by myself while my husband was at work.

The set-up took me about 2 hours from start to finish. (clearing the space, moving the old bed, pulling everything out of the boxes, assembling the base, and placing/opening our new 12" Zinus mattress on top)

VERY COMFORTABLE & worth the $!
Ikea would have been at least twice the price... if not more!

The 12" is actually "firm-er" than I had expected it to be, but I am pleased! Hubby who has hip & back issues is overjoyed. He's not in pain when we wakes up anymore.

We are both large people (600-700 lbs combined). I can barely tell when my husband moves around on his side of the bed, or gets up. The bed doesn't move. The base doesn't make a sound. It's amazing.

Serious koodos to the team @ Zinus.

titulo: Does not expand past 4 inches buy at own risk.
descripcion: Clearly NOT a 6 Inch mattress. Been 48 hours untouched and hasn't changed at all in 24 hours at 4 inches expanded. The topping feels like a cheap 5 dollar egg carton foam topper not memory foam at all. The slipcover seems to tight preventing the mattress from expanding past 4 inches. Total waste of money as clearly no way to return once expanded like this. This thing isn't much more than an over glorified mattress topper. I got my kids 6 Inch duo like this for similar price of this with the sale price and they came in box almost twice the size but at least expanded properly. This brand seems to over compress it to flat as possible which the base foam is not memory foam so it maintains part of its compression.  Would not recommend at all as I can't even use this in the condition it's in.

I bought this 6"queen mattress to use as a mattress topper over top of my old, uncomfortable, spring pillowtop. It was the best decision I have made in a while! Memory foam toppers that were thinner weren't cutting it for comfort, but this mattress did exactly what I was hoping/expecting it to do for comfort. It doesn't bunch up when tossing and turning like toppers do. It took about a week for it to decompress to the full 6 inches but I don't mind because I'm using it as a topper. It is firm yet soft enough to make bedtime more comfortable.  My hubby and I have better sleeps because of it. The other bonus is that since I have Amazon prime, this particular mattress gave me the oprion to make monthly payments to pay for it instead of having to pay for it all at once! I highly recommend this mattress! Very comfy! Packaged beautifully with a thank you card from Zinus as well as extra blank thank you cards to give to other people. How cool is that? I also like the green tea smell as well!

titulo: Great product! Comments re: the odor, quality, sheets
descripcion:
I wanted to wait to give a review until some time had passed, been weeks now. Overall amazing mattress for the price.

I bought the 10", which I think was the right choice. 8" is probably not soft enough and I read another review saying they preferred the 10" over the 12 because the 12" was a tad too soft, which I could definitely see. I also chose to get the gel infused, which again I think was the right choice, I feel a noticeable difference as my gf has one that doesn't have that.

I read some comments about sinking in due to the memory foam, perhaps a concern for real heavy people but I'm 6'2 190 and your body sinks in a bit where needed, definitely not where it's at all difficult to change positions. That should not be a concern with this mattress.

The mattress had quite the odor that lasted quite a while, honestly probably atleast a week or two. But it's gone now, I think keeping it uncovered without a sheet /bedding would have sped it up some. I only kept it without anything on it for a couple of days as I wanted to sleep on it of course

Expansion wasn't a problem, expands very fast the first 8 hours and then over the next 40 hours, finishes the remaining inch or two.

Oh and one good tip I didn't see mentioned. Get a fitted sheet for deep mattresses if you're getting a 10" or over as these are foam mattresses and you don't want it morphing your corners.

titulo: It's super comfy! I've never slept so well
descripcion: It's super comfy! I've never slept so well! Plus, there was no smell from the mattress & unpacking was really easy & it all puffed up to it's normal size almost immediately. I massaged the corners a bit because I read other reviews about how the corners sometimes won't inflate the same as the rest of the mattress, but the whole mattress inflated quite quickly & I probably could have left the corners alone & they'd be fine. Also, this mattress was delivered like 3 days after I ordered it! Amazing delivery! It is quite heavy tho, so definitely easier with a 2nd person (and it is recommended on the box & by the supplier)! Overall, this was an amazing purchase & it's better quality than others of the same price!

I waited a couple of months before writing a review so I could give a more informed experience.

First, I have to say I did not notice very much of a smell at all. I had read so many negative comments about the smell so I really looking out for it, and it was only ever so slight (barely perceptible). So for me, that was not an issue.

Second, and my biggest worry, was the mattress not expanding properly. I did have some issues, but they worked themselves out and the mattress is fine now. My personal experience was that after waiting a full 72 hours, half the mattress had expanded to about 10 inches, and half had expanded to 6-7 inches. You could clearly see a 'fold' in the mattress in the middle because of the way it was packed in the box and that was the dividing line between the 10 and the 6-7 inches. One thing the instructions do say (and encourage) is to sleep on the mattress after 72 hours and that your movement and weight on it will cause the rest of the mattress to expand properly.

so I put the 10 inches where my pillow was, and put the 6-7 inch side at my feet. Even not fully expanded I have to say it was massively comfortable. The sleep was amazing. It did take about 2 weeks of sleeping on it, but it eventually expanded evenly to 12 inches. I was seriously thinking I would have to return it (I wanted to avoid this for environmental reasons) but like I said, with a little patience it sorted itself out.

It is to be noted that I'm a big guy (300+ lbs) and I was worried the mattress wouldn't be firm enough and that I'd sink in. But in reality the firmness is perfect, and my fear of sinking into it did not occur.

Overall I am very satisfied with this product. It's the best night's sleep I've ever had. I used to wake up with a sore back because of my previous mattress, but this is not the case since getting the Zinus. I highly recommend.

Plus for the price (which is fantastic), you can't go wrong.

titulo: Comments on Amazon.com regarding glass fibers
descripcion:
Excellent sleep comfort provided by this product..

BUT

Amazon.com comments indicate the product contains a fire retardant barrier layer manufactured from
GLASS FIBERS ....

There are reports on that site that puncturing or un zipping the cover releases glass fibers.

I feel that the manufacturer and seller need to respond to these comments with assurance that if glass fibers are contained in the layer revealed when the zippered cover is removed, then the product will be recalled.

I got the 8" short queen green tea version of this mattress.

Having slept on it for a week, it is very comfortable. It is rated as 'firm' and it definitely is. The support is really good.

It expanded to full size in about 9-10 hours. There was very minimal odour and that was gone in a couple days.

My one gripe is that it was folded bottom side in which made unfolding it onto the bed frame in the tight confines of an RV somewhat difficult. If it had been folded bottom side out, unfolding it onto the frame would have been a cinch.

The mattress is very soft and offers minimal support for your spine. I purchased this mattress to replace by 8 year old memory foam mattress because it was starting to give me back issues due to its age, however this new mattress was even worse than the old one out of the box. I originally thought that at this price point, this is a great deal, however that was not the case. I have no idea how there are so many positive reviews, I do not recommend this purchase and would suggest another brand that has a 100 nights free return policy.

It is a great mattress for the price. It's soft but provides nice support. The foam smell lasted for more than a week, then gradually disappeared. My only real complaint with it is heat. As people write elsewhere, the foam really does not dissipate heat, so if your body runs hot, beware. I decided not to keep it after 3 weeks, but instead of going through the hassle of somehow packaging it up and sending it back, I donated it to someone in need.

The mattress is as advertised. There is an odor when you first unpack the mattress. I wouldn't call it foul, but it can be strong. I let the mattress sit with my window opened. After the first 24 hours, the mattress rose to about 9.5 inches, and the odor dissipated by about half. 48 hours after sitting, the mattress rose to about 11 inches. At this point, I slept on the mattress. It was comfortable. I did not find myself tossing about as I did with my older spring-style mattress. I fell asleep much sooner then I normally did and my quality of sleep improved. 60 hours after sitting, the mattress rose to just shy of 11.5 inches. The odor is nearly all but dissipated. I bought this along with a Zinus frame, and overall this has been a solid purchase. I would highly recommend it on the merits of cost and quality.

I purchased a Queen sized Zinus Mattress and beframe last year when my old bed needed replacing. I was hesitant about spending over a thousand dollars on a new bed, and didn't relish the thought of still having to move a heavy bed around for cleaning. When I saw the Zinus bed, I did some research, read the reviews and purchased the mattress, a tall bedframe and head and footboard clips, then followed the instructions when it arrived and set up my new bed. I was so impressed, that when I decided to replace the mattress on my guest room bed, I once gain chose Zinus.

The mattresses are very comfortable and give great support with no pressure spots or lumps as with conventional beds. Also, the foam mattress is covered in a removable, washable cover, and the foam itself is infused with green tea for added freshness and anti-microbial properties. The frames are silent, and don't make any noise at all when turning in bed, even on hardwood floors. Above all, the quality of them for the money paid is fantastic. To replace my old queen bed cost me less than a third of a buying a new box spring and mattress bed, and by all indications, it will last just as long, if not longer than my old box spring and mattress. For updating my guest bedroom, I simply replaced the mattress and used my old box spring and headboard. If for any reason it needs replacing in the future, I will do that again. Very highly recommended, especially if moving and needing a new bed. Why not get one brought directly to you instead?

titulo: With the A/C on it's fine. But the real problem was with support for ...
descripcion:
I am 5'7 and I weight 150lbs. I purchaed the 8inch - twin gel infused green tea.

This mattress was more on the medium-plush, more so on the plush side, for me. It sank quite a bit.
In consequence which brings me to my next issue, it sleep quite hot.
With a room temp of 26-28c and outdoors temp of <30c, I wake up with my back fully drenched in sweat.
With the A/C on it's fine. But the real problem was with support for me, it didnt work out for me. With a full sleep of 8h or more, I wake up with aches on the shoulders ( im a side sleeper ) and sometimes I get lower back pain if I sleep on my back. I tried to change my pillow, because I heard the pillow is about 20-30% of the sleep, no help.

Otherwise, it didn't really smell that much for me. I left it open for 2 days before using it.

In conclusion, if you live with the life with not too hot temps, or if you have a/c to accommodate that, this mattress might work for you if you like medium-plush.

After about a month I can share my thoughts. I couldn't care less about memory foam, hybrid or spring. It's all just nonsense to me anyway. I ordered this bed for a couple of reasons and it passed, that's all I care about. If it lasts will be the next test. I wanted gel because supposedly it keeps you cooler. It is no difference from any bed. So if regular foam is hot this is no different from a traditional spring mattress. Who ever thinks this bed is on the softer side might be on too much medication. It is very firm. I like this. It could go slightly less firm but my back is happy that's all that matters. And the price point it's excellent. I spoke with 2 of their reps. One was horrible, didn't understand any of my questions, which were detailed. The other person was adequate. All around with price being a factor very happy. The middle is slightly firmer but maybe because I don't sleep in the middle, so I can't judge properly.

titulo: Close to 6 inches but not quite
descripcion:
We bought this based off of the reviews, it's decently comfortable but the 6 inch mattress is realistically 4.5-5 inches. I am a side sleeper and don't find there is enough memory foam to remain comfortable all night. It's decent, but it isn't "Great". We are going to return it and go for an 8-inch or 10 inch for additional comfort.

I did not notice that the "smell" that is known to come with mattresses in a box was all that bad, I still had a decent sleep, but for the extra comfort, this one will be going back and I'll upgrade to a thicker mattress. It would be good for a teenager that isn't as heavy as an adult.

Overall a 6/10 rating from me.

Our old mattress was really, really old. We decided to try to Green Tea cooling gel mattress (queen) after reading a lot of reviews. We opened it and the smell was pretty bad but disappeared after a couple of hours. We didn't wait the full 24-48 hours to sleep on it. It was pretty fluffy after 2 hours (tbf we just moved and had nowhere else to sleep). It was heaven. I could tell it was not fully puffed up, but it was still very comfortable. The next night it was fully developed and ready for the real sleep test. I have never slept so well. It was not overly hot (I had just a foam topper before and was always sweating). This kept me at the perfect temperature all night. My partner and I are both around 200 lbs and there is no shifting when someone rolls over, no falling into each other. It was heaven. I am a back/side sleeper and for once no leg pain, no back pain, no pain at all. My partner said the same thing. Don't hesitate. Buy this mattress. It is so worth it.

This mattress has completely changed how comfortable our sleep is! The quality is absolutely amazing for the price, and we are so glad we chose this over a $800+ mattress! We will definitely be purchasing Zinus memory foam when our other mattresses need replacing!

LOVE this mattress. We were in the market for something cooling (both hot sleepers) and comfortable and this mattress has been a dream. It was fully raised with air after 24 hours and was instantly amazing to sleep on. It conforms comfortably to the contours of your body and bounces back up quickly. We've been sleeping on it for 3 months now and it's integrity hasn't been compromised whatsoever. A few things I looked for in the reviews at time of purchase were: does it smell when removed from the package? Do the corners puff out properly? How many inches are too much or too little?
There was a mild odor when unboxing but it was not overwhelming and reminded me mostly of the plastic it'd been wrapped in than chemical odor from the manufacturer. The mattress conveniently arrived just as we were moving into a new house, so I was able to leave it alone in a bedroom with the window open for a full day before checking on it and the smell from it never raised any flags - I should note, I am also particularly scent-sensitive and was 5 months pregnant at the time so if it'd been overwhelming I would have avoided it.
The corners puffed out just as they were meant to. One side raised quicker than the other and this worried me initially but eventually it was completely even. We decided to go for the 8" as several reviews had indicated that there was no real need for anything more. This couldn't be more true. With baby, I'm about 220lbs, and the lowest my body sinks into the mattress may be 3-4 inches at the most. When I'm laid down, the weight is distributed more evenly and thus causes sinking to be even less, so during sleep there are still several spare inches between you and whatever platform or box spring you have below it. I can rest comfortably on my side or back with no issues and have found that being on my back is even more comfortable with this bed than others because the foam moulds so nicely around you.
Something important to note, like any memory foam mattress, one should keep in mind that this is NOT a bed that you can jump into! It doesn't absorb shock AT all.
For the price point, Amazon Prime delivery option and overall satisfaction, I would recommend this mattress to ANYONE in the market. An incredible value, especially with Endy/Casper and other competitors offering similar products at 5-10x the price.
** to note as well, we also purchased the Zinus bed frame separately and were super impressed with it as well. Very simple and sleek design, extremely straight-forward building instructions and a great little multi-tool that came with. Plus, it came with some super handy little double-sides adhesive strips that cling the mattress to the steel frame to prevent it from slipping around! Amazing!**

I punched the corners for 5 minutes and it expanded lol. I think something to do with packaging. After about 3 hours it's was 8 inches and I immediately laid down. Shipping was on time too. I slept 18 hours, no sleeping pills nothing, and I got chronic insomnia and severely worry about life at night as most miserable people like me! My last bed was a 1500 dollar plush top queen and this is exactly the same but low profile, which I like cause my cat is extremely fat.

After 3 days of sleeping away setting the room up with RGB I noticed a little green card at the bottom of the box. Opening it is a sincere letter expressing feeling honoured to be in my home, along with 3 greeting cards saying hello you, thank you, and another hello you. All in all its the best god damn mattress I've EVER slept on and I appreciate the gesture with the cards. Buy this mattress you won't regret it, if I can sleep through the cruel world so can you.

titulo: Great mattress for thost that love the foam
descripcion: I am beyond happy with this purchase. Very nicely covered and puffed up to full potential in 3 days. I have a bit of a trick to getting it to puff up well. They like heat when out of the package, so open the windows and let the sun in and close the door, Love the smell of it's newness but leaves in a few days. It has a medium firmness but I have also added a gel foam topper to the top of it to keep it protected and a puffy cover over both. It is exactly as stated in all ways on the Advertising. I myself love this mattress, not enough stars for me to rate how I feel bout this product.

We just received this and it is exactly what I wanted. We are using it to replace a 16 year old mattress in our 5th wheel trailer. I set out to cut the mattress to fit the space (which is a full mattress cut on an angle at one end) . I was able to easily remove the outer cover with the zipper and the foam layers were in another light fabric which I removed the thread at the seam. The mattress is three different foam layers. I was able to cut the angle I needed using a bread knife. It cut so fast.

I found the task of modifying the foam to suit for our space quite easy. Once I cut the foam, I stitched the fabric back up, zipped back on the cover and now it looks like a brand new professionally place mattress in our RV!

Great mattress, provides good support. You really won't find something better for this price or cheaper. Because it's entirely foam you have to realize it won't always fully expand back to an exact dimension and it will wear sooner thsn other types/brands.

Bodyweight also plays a big role. These mattresses are better for lighter people who don't need as much support. Try out beds at your nearby mattress store... If plush/soft is want you like best then this mattress is for you... If you need a mid to firm mattress then it won't be good

titulo: This looks like its going to be good
descripcion: We opened the box and put it into our camper and it opened as it should do with no issues at all. I think the size was right for a short queen for our RV. We have not tested it yet overnight as we have not been able to go camping but have laid on it for quite a while. It is a little on the firm side but it didn't feel uncomfortable. I will update when we get to use it overnight. My husband suffers with a very bad back and i hope this helps as the mattresses that come with RV's really are crap. We got this mattress at a great price so here's hoping it is worth it.

titulo: Excellent quality without an expensive price.
descripcion:
This mattress is fantastic. It arrived early and I opened the box and let the mattress out of the packaging the next day. I let it sit flat for three days and massaged the corners (based on a review I read). It plumped up to 8‚Äù with the corners at about 7 1/2‚Äù.

I have a $1000 twin mattress and this is more comfortable. Still provides support but allows me to sleep on my sides without hurting my hip. 100% worth it, I will be buying another larger mattress for guests and a another twin for a daybed.

Bought this mattress to replace the horrible one our trailer came with.  It IS an improvement over the awful spring ones included with most trailers - but not much of one.  It's firm - VERY firm.  We put a feather bed AND a foam topper on and it's still bothering me.  I wish I had spent a little more and got a thicker mattress with a pillow top instead of having to add all sorts of things to this one.  If you are desperate it's a good value in that it was cheap and seems well made but if you can afford something else I suggest you keep looking.

Very pleased with my sons new mattress. Once the mattress arrived we drove right in opening it up, it only look about 20 minutes for the mattress to fully reinflate. We bought the 8", and as you can see from the picture, it only fluffed up to 7.5" - no big deal. The mattress is VERY comfortable, nice and squishy soft while still having the perfect amount of support. My son's been using his mattress for a few nights & we've already seen an improvement in his sleep habits. Will be purchasing another in the future for my own bed. Lol.

This is the second Zinus mattress I've bought. Unlike the first unit which opened and expanded fully. This unit never really expanded to the full 12 inch height. Probably 11inch max. Has a couple of irregular low spots. But really for the money is still a great purchase and really comfortable mattress.
4 outta 5 is a fair and honest rating.
The "Queen" in the description bears no relation to the actual size of the mattress, which turned out to be a double or twin (I can't remember offhand the exact size).

I really wanted to like this mattress, but overall Im disappointed. Its hard and very uncomfortable. Based on the reviews I ordered the 8 inch queen, but I can barely sleep on it. Im now looking at getting a 4 inch memory foam topper, that will add considerably to the price, which kinda defeats the purpose of buying this mattress in the first place. Perhaps I should have gotten the 12 inch, but its past the time frame to return it. I've had it for 2 months and honestly wish I had never bought it.

We bought this mattress when moving our 3yo into a larger bed. For adults who like a firm mattress you'd probably find this one on the soft side, but my kid sleeps comfortably in it. The mattress took longer than the estimated 48h to fully expand, at 48h it was only at 7.5in in the middle of the sides and less at the corners. The cover slides around a little more than I expected it would as well, and while we were setting it up I noticed that the weave of the fabric snags easily if you put things on the bed without a sheet or a cover.

It did have a weird smell for a few days after we opened it up, but it went away by about day 4 (and might have gone sooner if we were able to keep all the windows open, it's too cold this time of year to do that).

So, generally, I'm happy with it and would consider buying another one if we ever needed a third mattress.

The delivery was a day late (In spite of Prime), but other than that I am happy with my purchase. It was very well packaged and came with cute, clear instructions.
I opened it right away and it was almost 6 " thick within 1/2 and hour. (2nd and 3rd pics) By the next day it was full size.
I did a LOT of homework and read MANY reviews before buying this as I'm on a limited income and wanted to make a good purchase. I weigh over 300 pounds and had concerns about it supporting my weight. It is firmer than I thought (which is good) and so far the support is very good.
There was some odor for a day or two, but given the packaging and what it's made of, that's to be expected. It was gone within a few days.
I read some reviews commenting that the corners did not fill in properly, to full height. I suspect this has more to do with the cover restricting it than anything - they are about 1/2 " less thick, but I don't sleep on the corners so it's all good! I walked all over thee mattress a few times as it was expanding to help it along (especially the corners, which I read was helped by being 'massaged') and I think that helped it fluff up quickly. When I was walking on it, I felt like maybe the mattress was too soft, but once I laid down on it, it was actually firmer than I thought it would be.
This mattress is an incredible value and I hope to enjoy many years on it.

We were on the hunt for a new mattress that was reasonably priced, suited our comfort expectations, and could be delivered straight to our door because honestly, we loathe shopping... and shopping for a mattress? No thanks. We did lengthy research before deciding to bite the bullet on this mattress. We‚Äôve now enjoyed it for a couple of months, and I can honestly say it is has been an excellent purchase. I am 9 months pregnant and around 7 months or so, I started experiencing severe back pain that left me walking with a limp for weeks. I can‚Äôt be sure if this mattress is the reason why it went away, but after just 2 nights of sleeping on it, I awoke with zero back pain and have not experienced any since. Could I call it a miracle worker? I‚Äôm hesitant to make such a claim; however, it was the only thing I changed during that tiny time frame. We did allow it to ‚Äúair out‚Äù for several hours on top of our bedframe, but we slept in it that night just fine and no smell has lingered. I highly recommend this product if you‚Äôre searching for a reasonably priced mattress you want delivered right to your door. Shipping was also incredibly fast. I believe we received it within 4 days from our order date.

titulo: Great bed for price with some caveats
descripcion:
Bought this mattress for our guest bedroom - and our guests have given it rave reviews!

HOWEVER a couple things to note:

1) There is a slight smell even after unfurling it for 3 weeks or so (with windows open during the day). It was lying on the ground, but we had to prop it up against the wall recently and I have a feeling the smell is coming from the bottom not being able to air out. Hopefully this helps.

2) The 12" is really comfy but too thick for a guest mattress. It'll make moving it harder and you'll need extra wide mattress sheets to fit this.

3) The price of the mattress dropped by $25 less than 12 hours after I purchased it on a 'deal'. Makes me wonder about what's going on with the pricing. I e-mailed Amazon and never heard back from them. I needed the mattress so didn't do more (actual purchase price was about $304)

This is the best purchase I‚Äôve ever made on amazon! I never thought I‚Äôd buy a mattress online, but I figured I would give it a shot for the price. I am SO glad that I did. This bed is like sleeping on a cloud, but at the same time not too soft that you sink in. I used to have issues with hip pain, and it‚Äôs all but disappeared since buying this. I‚Äôm a stomach sleeper, and have had no issues. I also slept on this bed after 24 hours of letting it inflate - not sure if it has inflated to the full 12 inches since I haven‚Äôt measured, but it seriously makes no difference to me. If you‚Äôre thinking about buying this, DO IT!

titulo: This is my first memory foam mattress and I have to say I love it. Not near as hot as I was ...
descripcion: Had it for 3 months now, switched from a innerspring.  This is my first memory foam mattress and I have to say I love it.  Not near as hot as I was in my previous innerspring and no pressure points.  Cannot say how it compares to the higher priced memory foams as I have not tried them, but I would say that if your nervous to make the switch try one of these as the price is right!  I'm glad I did.

titulo: I returned it after a week. It had a ...
descripcion: I returned it after a week. It had a chemical odor that didn't diminish, and was toxic causing morning headache, nasal congestion, nausea, sore muscles, etc.. After a week it decompressed to only 10" at center locations and much less at the corners.

I was hesitant to order this bed as I have seen in comments bad things about Fiberglass, the cover is soft, smooth and no bad chemical smell, I did purchase a case for the mattress and I‚Äôm glad I did because there is very clear instruction to not remove the existing cover ever .  Glad I ordered this for the kiddos bunk beds and honestly... I‚Äôm a little disappointed I didn‚Äôt look here before purchasing my Endy because the two are very similar. Both of my 8 inch mattresses were expanded completely within the hour though it does say to allow 72 hours for full expansion.

titulo: Worth the money and then some!!
descripcion: I've always slept on a spring mattress my whole life. I always wondered what these memory foam mattresses felt like. Well my old bed was making me wake up sore, really sore and my back was killing me every morning. I ordered this figuring it couldn't be any worse then my old bed if it sucked. Boy was I wrong!! I slept better then I have slept in a long, long time and did not wake up sore at all. Don't get me wrong it took some getting used to. It's hard to explain the way it feels, it's firm but soft at the same time. I really can't believe how refreshed I feel waking up now...other then the not wanting to get out of bed in the morning now lol. My old bed I was up right away because it wasn't comfortable. I still can't believe the price on these!!!

titulo: It‚Äôs bigger than your average king size mattress. Measure before you buy.
descripcion:
Like - you can‚Äôt beat the price. It‚Äôs a comfy mattress. It took 24hrs to rise up, 48hrs for it complete. Temperature plays a factor so make sure the room is warm, otherwise it will take longer to blow up. Memory foam works and it‚Äôs comfortable to sleep.
Dislike - the mattress was bigger than the frame and box. The box is a Zinus box as well which I bought together. Box fit the frame, mattress was bigger by 2‚Äù. Be aware. I made it work, no issue for me. FYI

This is a firmer mattress that does not transfer motion. I bought it for my 5 year olds bed (as his previous mattress was done for). I didn‚Äôt want to spend a lot (as it is for a child that will likely need to have it replaced again in a few years). It‚Äôs so comfortable that my parents are now replacing their expensive mattress at home with this brand! And I‚Äôm sure when my own mattress needs replacing, we‚Äôll be looking at zinus as well! They have great products!

Amazing sleep ,love it so far ,very comfy ,not too firm ,not too soft , which I was affraid since I'm a big guy
I have a bed frame,a spring box and 12 inches matress ,so a bit hard to sit on the side to get dress ü§£ü§£ü§£
So far I highly recommend it

titulo: Honestly, I have nothing bad to say
descripcion:
I got this bed on Sunday, so it's been about four days since it arrived and I set it up. I slept on it the first night. I saw a review or two that praised massaging the mattress as it was decompressing. Definitely worked for me, since it's pretty darn even. Also, no toxic smells with mine - and this is coming from someone who cannot open her window yet (it is broken). Honestly, I had my boyfriend over the next day and he slept over and it was lovely - motion transfer? I don't know her. I am a side, back and sometimes stomach sleeper (more side though) and this was comfortable. First night it was a little hard, but it gave way a bit as the days went by. It's my first even memory foam mattress and I love it, nothing else to say.

Full transparency: I use a traditional box spring with it (that i used with my old mattress) so just wanted to point that out.

Reading the positive and negative reviews, I decided to take a chance on this mattress. I was interested in the 4 layer foam technology and hoping I'd be lucky enough to get a "good" one that inflated all the way and was great. Unfortunately, that did not happen. Like others, mine did not inflate all the way. We unpacked it according to instructions and let it "do its thing" for 3 days. The corners and edges never fully inflated. This isn't my first rodeo with memory foam mattresses, as I've bought Lucid, Signature Sleep and Brentwood, all very happy with them. Not this one. The sides are soft and bottom out when you sit on them to put your shoes & socks on. None of my other mattresses did that. Unhappy with this product and will be contacting customer service.

titulo: Amazing mattress! Best night sleep I‚Äôve ever had!
descripcion: Amazing Mattress. Took a couple of days to expand it to actual size however after that it was very comfortable to sleep on. I bought it for my grandma and she was very happy and does not complain of back pain anymore. Thank you very much amazing seller backspac mattress. Took a couple of days to expand to actual size however after that it was very comfortable to sleep on. I bought it for my grandma and she was very happy and does not complain of back pain anymore. Thank you very much. Will be ordering more mattresses from this seller in the future.

titulo: It is the most comfortable thing I have ever slept on
descripcion: I was skeptical about buying a mattress that i didn't get to see/try in person and one that is a 1/3rd the cost of basic mattresses locally. After reading the negative reviews and the positives, I decided to risk it. The package took about a week to show up (Ground and i'm on an island). We took it out around 6pm and within an hour or two it was to it's max size. It came to about 11" and has been ever since but this has not in the slightest affected it's performance. It is the most comfortable thing I have ever slept on. Please, do you self a favour and take the gamble. It's worth it.

Queen Size. I am using this on a 10" gel foam mattress that is too hard for me.  It is quite comfortable and I sleep better.  I find that being alone, my dog tends to slip toward me on one side (LOL) from my body weight.  The only real complaint I have is the terrible strong mold (foam) smell.  It's been three weeks now and it still smells although not as strong.  I am a lot cooler on this mattress than my regular memory foam, and would recommend it.

AMAZING MATTRESS!!! I  have ordered two others from Amazon but not this brand. I have never felt such comfort as I have with this. I have arthritis in my spine and hips and knees. This mattress, is absolutely fantastic in helping me sleep properly. Filled out the second I removed the plastic cover. Inflated full length. People: You want a mattress that will exceed your expectations, then buy this....FIVE STARS THANK YOU AMAZON!

Once arrived it took around a full day to inflate. Inflated to the designated size, there is a smell, not so bad, noticeable but not as nasty as other reviewers would describe. Opening the window would help refresh the room as well as the mattress.

Did some little research before purchasing. Anything below 10" was not recommended. 10" for anyone below 250lb. 12" if you are 2 or more sleeping.

For some people this might feel too soft. But oh boy does it feel like you're melting. I originally slept on a spring mattress for 10+ years. Oh the difference is HUGE, I didn't have sleeping troubles, as well as on contrary it does not feel cold with the gel infused foam, it plenty warm with a simple thin cover.

So far for a month it feels great! Hopefully this will last for months

With all the rave reviews, I expected this mattress to be better. It fluffed up just fine and no smell, so that was great. But it's really too firm for me. As a side sleeper, it hurts the hips. And it's *really* hot. I can't see keeping it more than a year. I'll be going to a store to buy my next one.
Update: I ended up returning it. You can imagine the hassle of shipping a king-size mattress. That's how much I disliked this product.

This product was bought for my teenage son. Only gave a 4 star because our mattress only made it to 9", not the full 10". It decompressed for 72 hours before we used it. There was no foul odors at all like some reviews mentioned. I was very pleased with the faint green tea scent. My son finds it very comfortable. It makes him sleep hotter, but he just sleeps without his duvet. I wish I would have ordered the size up, the 12", if i would have known I'd lose that extra inch. All in all though, we're very pleased with this product and would recommend. I have definitely been converted to the foam mattress over the old school spring.

titulo: A year later and still love it
descripcion:
I have waited a FULL YEAR to review this mattress. Wanted to actually give it time to perform (or, alternatively, to fall apart...)
We are still SO happy with this mattress. I sleep so well on it! And I slept through an entire 9 months of pregnancy with this thing, so that says something.
There was a smell when we first got it, but, call me crazy, I sort of liked the smell?! It wasn‚Äôt really chemical, it more smelled like an essential oil or something? Hard to explain. But don‚Äôt let the threat of a smell scare you off. It goes away, and the sleep is outstanding.

We bought this for our camper and it greatly surpassed my expectations.  Being only 6 inches thick, I was concerned we would sink to the bottom, but we did not!  My husband and I are not small people.  Hubby is 250ish pounds and we both found it very comfy.  Not sure if I‚Äôd buy for everyday use, but for $250 it is a dang nice camper mattress.
